level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Commissioner, through the Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2 [ยง 2-501 et seq.], may issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2132 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-223
level.text: For Law 18-223, see notes following ยง 31-5041.01.
